mapper.insert:
insert into anchor (anchor_id, room_id, name, nickname, phone) values
( #{anchor.anchorId}, #{anchor.roomId}, #{anchor.name}, #{anchor.nickname}, #{anchor.phone} )

insert into sys_user_details (employee_id, username, name, gender, nickname, avatar, role) values
( #{sysUserDetails.employeeId}, #{sysUserDetails.username}, #{sysUserDetails.name}, #{sysUserDetails.gender}, #{sysUserDetails.nickname}, #{sysUserDetails.avatar}, #{sysUserDetails.role} )

insert into sys_user (employee_id, username, password, role) values
( #{sysUser.employeeId}, #{sysUser.username}, #{sysUser.password}, #{sysUser.role} )

insert into anchor_realtime (anchor_id, watch_num, gift, bullet_screen, time) values
( #{anchorOnlineData.anchorId}, #{anchorOnlineData.watchNum}, #{anchorOnlineData.gift}, #{anchorOnlineData.bulletScreen}, #{anchorOnlineData.time} )

insert into team_realtime (team_id, watch_num, gift, bullet_screen, time) values
( #{teamOnlineData.teamId}, #{teamOnlineData.watchNum}, #{teamOnlineData.gift}, #{teamOnlineData.bulletScreen}, #{teamOnlineData.time} )

insert into group_realtime (group_id, watch_num, gift, bullet_screen, time) values
( #{groupOnlineData.groupId}, #{groupOnlineData.watchNum}, #{groupOnlineData.gift}, #{groupOnlineData.bulletScreen}, #{groupOnlineData.time} )

insert into branch_realtime (branch_id, watch_num, gift, bullet_screen, time) values
( #{branchOnlineData.branchId}, #{branchOnlineData.watchNum}, #{branchOnlineData.gift}, #{branchOnlineData.bulletScreen}, #{branchOnlineData.time} )
insert into total_realtime (total_id, watch_num, gift, bullet_screen, time) values ( #{totalId}, #{watchNum}, #{gift}, #{bulletScreen}, #{time})
